content: space between 1st and 2nd treble_crochet of row below * 3 chain 1 double_crochet into 2nd double_crochet of group 3 chain skip next chain space 7 treble_crochet into next chain space repeat from * finish with 3 chain 1 double_crochet into 2nd double_crochet of last group 3 chain skip next chain space 4 treble_crochet into space between last treble_crochet of row below and turning chain space turn row 3 make 1 chain 1 double_crochet into each of next 4 treble_crochet * 5 chain 1 double_crochet into each of next 7 treble_crochet repeat from * finish with 5 chain 1 double_crochet into each of last 3 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet into top of turning chain turn row 4 make 1 chain 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet * 3 chain 1 treble_crochet 3 chain 1 treble_crochet into 3rd chain of next chain space 3 chain skip 2 double_crochet of group 1 double_crochet into each of next 3 double_crochet repeat from * finish with 3 chain 1 treble_crochet chain 3 1 treble_crochet into 3rd chain of last chain space 3 chain skip 2 double_crochet of last group 1 double_crochet into each of last 2 double_crochet turn row 5 make 1 chain 1 double_crochet into 1st double_crochet 3 chain skip 1 chain space 7 treble_crochet into next chain space * 3 chain 1 double_crochet in 2nd double_crochet of group 3 chain skip next chain space 7 treble_crochet in next chain space repeat from * finish with 3 chain skip last chain space 1 double_crochet in last double_crochet turn row 6 make 3 chain * 1 double_crochet into each of next 7 treble_crochet 5 chain repeat from * finish with 3 chain 1 double_crochet into last double_crochet turn row 7 make 5 chain 1 treble_crochet into first double_crochet * 3 chain skip 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 3 double_crochet 3 chain 1 treble_crochet 3 chain 1 treble_crochet into 3rd chain of next chain space repeat from * finish with 3 chain skip 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 3 double_crochet 3 chain 1 treble_crochet 3 chain 1 treble_crochet in 1st chain of turning chain of row below turn work row 2 7 until have worked 9 repeats of the pattern work a further repeat ending with row 3 or 6 this will obviously depend on how much yarn you have left at this point © 2008 yarnmistrys co uk kai mistry photography kai mistry & oliver rochford all rights reserved for personal use only apple blossom stole by kai mistry for the second half of the shawl begin at the initial cast on chain with rs facing start from row 1 of trellis pattern slip_stitch into first chain and then chain 3 counts as 1 treble_crochet and work the treble_crochet into the same space as the slip_stitch carry on from the first * once you have completed the trellis pattern work lace pattern as you did for the first half of the stole f inishing
